ActAccessible Canada Act
SubjectAccessible Transportation Planning and Reporting Regulations
PrecisACCESSIBLE TRANSPORTATION PLANNING AND REPORTING REGULATIONS in order to create a set of requirements for the development of accessibility plans, progress reports and feedback processes, and allow for the identification and removal of barriers to an accessible transportation network.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0243 Publication Date: 2021-12-22
